name: io.github.jasonxkensei/xproof
description: Trust primitive for AI agents & humans. Certify file hashes on MultiversX blockchain with immutable, verifiable proofs of existence and ownership. Supports ACP (EGLD), x402 (USDC on Base), and native API key auth.

tools.name: certify_file
tools.description: Create a blockchain certification for a file in a single API call via POST /api/proof. Records the SHA-256 hash on MultiversX blockchain as immutable proof of existence and ownership. Cost: $0.05 per certification.

file_hash.description: SHA-256 hash of the file (64 hex characters)

webhook_url.description: Optional HTTPS URL to receive a POST notification when the proof is confirmed on-chain. Payload is signed with HMAC-SHA256 (X-xProof-Signature header).

tools.name: verify_proof
tools.description: Verify an existing xproof certification. Returns proof details including file hash, timestamp, blockchain transaction, and verification status.

proof_id.description: UUID of the certification to verify

tools.name: get_proof
tools.description: Retrieve a proof in structured format (JSON or Markdown). Use json for machine processing, md for LLM consumption.

format.description: Output format: json for machine processing, md for LLM consumption

tools.name: discover_services
tools.description: Discover available xproof certification services, pricing, and capabilities. No authentication required.

authentication.instructions: Obtain an API key by authenticating with a MultiversX wallet at https://xproof.app, then POST to /api/keys. Alternatively, use x402 payment protocol (USDC on Base) for keyless per-request access.
